LeadMonthlyMetric.name: LeadMonthlyMetric
LeadMonthlyMetric.description: Represents the monthly engagement metrics for a lead.

AllCallsCallBackLater.description: The number of calls in the month for this lead with the call result Call Back Later.

AllCallsLeftVoicemail.description: The number of calls in the month for this lead with the call result Left Voicemail.

AllCallsMeaningfulConnect.description: The number of calls in the month for this lead with the call result Meaningful Connect.

AllCallsNotInterested.description: The number of calls in the month for this lead with the call result Not Interested.

AllCallsUncategorized.description: The number of calls in the month for this lead with no call result specified.

AllCallsUnqualified.description: The number of calls in the month for this lead with the call result Unqualified.

AllEmailsBouncedCount.description: The total of hard and soft bounced emails for this lead in the month.

AllEmailsDeliveredCount.description: The number of successfully delivered emails for this lead in the month.

AllEmailsDeliveredRate.description: The percentage of tracked emails sent that were successfully delivered to this lead. This field is a calculated field.

AllEmailsHardBouncedCount.description: The number of hard bounced emails for this lead in the month.

AllEmailsOutOfOfficeCount.description: The number of emails that triggered an out of office reply for this lead in the month.

AllEmailsSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this lead in the month.

AllEmailsSoftBouncedCount.description: The number of emails soft bounced for this lead in the month.

AllEmailsTrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with engagement tracking enabled in the month.

AllEmailsUntrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this lead without engagement tracking enabled in the month.

AllTotalCallsCount.description: The total number of calls to this lead with all call results in the month.

HardBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with hard bounce tracking.

LeadId.description: The ID of the related lead.

LinkClickTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with link click tracking.

Month.description: The month in which the engagement occurred.

MonthInt.description: The month in which the engagement occurred, in yyyymm format.

OpenTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with open tracking.

OutOfOfficeTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with out-of-office tracking.

ReplyTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with reply tracking.

SoftBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this lead with soft bounce tracking.

TrackableSendHardBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with hard bounce tracking that hard bounced. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendLinkClickRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with link tracking that had link clicks. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendOpenRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with open tracking that were opened by the recipient. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendOutOfOfficeRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with out-of-office tracking that received out-of-office replies. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendReplyRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with reply tracking that received replies. This field is a calculated field.

TrackableSendSoftBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this lead with soft bounce tracking that soft bounced. This field is a calculated field.

UniqueEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of individual emails in which the lead clicked a link in the month.

UniqueEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of individual emails opened by the lead in the month.

UniqueEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of individual emails replied to by the lead in the month.
